title: cintaya mA kanda mUlakandam
sahitya:
cintaya mA kanda mUlakandam cEtah shrI sOmAskandam


anupallavi

 santatam akhaNDa saccitAnandam samrAjyaprada caraNAravindam


caraNam   mangaLakara mandahAsa vadanam mANikyamaya kAncI sadanam anga saundarya vijita madanam antaka 
sUdanam kunda radanam uttunga kamanIya vrSaturangam bhairavI prasangam guruguhAntarangam prthvI lingam
